item.title: Rewriting Lambda to restart Workspaces of UNHEALTHY with python
item.description: I'll do Hands Lab Advent Calendar this year as well Overview We use Workspaces, a service that provides virtual desktops for AWS, Sometimes itâ€™s unhealthy \ Broken without doing anything / Most of the time, it is possible to manage by restarting due to a temporary load drop. So there is Lambda that restarts for the time being It’s written in Node.js, so it supports frequent version upgrades… It’s simple code, so I thought I’d rewrite it to python anyway
